channel.title: I don't have Unlimited Run - Help
channel.description: Yeah, I don't have unlimited run lol, don't know how to code it, I searched energy, didn't find much that I knew what to do with. Your help would be appreciated.

item.title: I don't have Unlimited Run - Help
item.dc:creator: @morterdestroyer morterdestroyer
item.description:
@morterdestroyer wrote:

unlimited run? for just you? go to source, characters, ur name, find energy… not sure how to make everyone unlimited… instead of playerName.equals (" usage ") try…

if (playerRights >= 2 && playerEnergy > 100)
{
playerEnergy = 100000;
}
sendFrame126("@red@100%", 149);
}

Read full topic
item.source: I don't have Unlimited Run - Help

item.title: I don't have Unlimited Run - Help
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

That’s only for one person though right? I see the command is if playerName.equals(“usagi”), I want it for everyone? Inless i’m not reading it right?

Read full topic

item.title: I don't have Unlimited Run - Help
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

On delta its in the file Player.java… I just whipped something like this up. Note that like half of this is already there.

if (playerEnergy > 0) { if(playerName.equals("Usagi")) { playerEnergy = 100; } playerEnergy -= 1; } else { isRunning2 = false; }

Read full topic
item.source: I don't have Unlimited Run - Help
